text: Aoranthe is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in tropical Africa. == Species == * Aoranthe annulata (K.Schum.) Somers * Aoranthe castaneofulva (S.Moore) Somers * Aoranthe cladantha (K.Schum.) Somers * Aoranthe nalaensis (De Wild.) Somers * Aoranthe penduliflora (K.Schum.) Somers == References == == External links == * Aoranthe in the World Checklist of Rubiaceae Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Gardenieae Category:Flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aoranthe
